title: Wear App for Android Wear
summary: Download now and enjoy Wear App for Android Wear !
developerAddress: Bucharest, Nicolae G Caramfil Street, No 49,Second Floor
description: Looking for a new beautiful theme to personalize your smart watch? Excellent! Wear App for Android Wear is targeting everyone who enjoys beautiful watch faces.Looking for a perfect design? We have just released an amazing new Watch Face to fit your expectations. Download now Wear App for Android Wear and make your device look amazing.How to setup Wear App for Android Wear:★ Install Android Wear first!★ Open Android Wear and synchronize your device.★ Click “More” from the watchfaces list and choose Wear App for Android Wear.★ That’s it! New watch face will display in a few seconds.★ Try different themes and colors and choose the best one!We are releasing every day different watchfaces for any mood or style. With us, you have plenty of themes you can choose from. Simple, complex, elegant, minimal, classic, modern, exquisite, colorful, vintage, golden and plenty new ones are waiting to be discovered! Features:★ Designed by professional artists !★ Battery friendly !★ Easy installing process★ Compatible with all Android Wear devices★ Analog display★ New beautiful themes every day !!! You can check anytime our best list of beautiful wear themes by clicking the “More watch faces” button in the Wear App for Android Wear app settings menu.Wear App for Android Wear is compatible with:★ ASUS ZENWATCH★ LG G WATCH R★ MOTO 360★ SONY SMARTWATCH 3★ LG G WATCH★ SAMSUNG GEAR LIVE★ HUAWEI WATCH NEW!★ LG WATCH URBANE NEW!Our watch faces are thoroughly tested on various devices so we can provide top quality, bug free products! descriptionHTML:
Looking for a new beautiful theme to personalize your smart watch? Excellent! Wear App for Android Wear is targeting everyone who enjoys beautiful watch faces.
Looking for a perfect design? We have just released an amazing new Watch Face to fit your expectations. Download now Wear App for Android Wear and make your device look amazing.
How to setup Wear App for Android Wear:
★ Install Android Wear first!
★ Open Android Wear and synchronize your device.
★ Click “More” from the watchfaces list and choose Wear App for Android Wear.
★ That’s it! New watch face will display in a few seconds.
★ Try different themes and colors and choose the best one!
We are releasing every day different watchfaces for any mood or style. With us, you have plenty of themes you can choose from. Simple, complex, elegant, minimal, classic, modern, exquisite, colorful, vintage, golden and plenty new ones are waiting to be discovered!
Features:
★ Designed by professional artists !
★ Battery friendly !
★ Easy installing process
★ Compatible with all Android Wear devices
★ Analog display
★ New beautiful themes every day !!!
You can check anytime our best list of beautiful wear themes by clicking the “More watch faces” button in the Wear App for Android Wear app settings menu.
Wear App for Android Wear is compatible with:
★ ASUS ZENWATCH
★ LG G WATCH R
★ MOTO 360
★ SONY SMARTWATCH 3
★ LG G WATCH
★ SAMSUNG GEAR LIVE
★ HUAWEI WATCH NEW!
★ LG WATCH URBANE NEW!


Our watch faces are thoroughly tested on various devices so we can provide top quality, bug free products! Also, if you have any suggestions on how we can improve your experience or if you would like to see a particular watch face with some specific design please write us at the e-mail address: watchfacebytme@gmail.com. Your feedback is very important for us.
comments: Cannot open on my phone. The only visible thing is the uninstal button
Wow There are some awesome watch faces! Thanks dev. I love it.
Off center Beauty On my moto 360 it is off center from the top by about 1/4 inch,  Uninstalled it, a pity!
